backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature evidence report linking requirements to affected frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files including pages, components, and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes with global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and setting meta title/description.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the AhanaProposalPage.
frontend/src/components/ConfettiBurst.ts: Generates animated confetti pieces with reduced‑motion support for celebrations.
frontend/src/components/CuteParticles.ts: Creates floating heart and sparkle particles with motion‑preference handling.
frontend/src/components/SimpleProposalMo: Single‑step Valentine proposal flow with confetti celebration and reset option.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actors tied to Internet Identity, refetching when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login logic, and provides identity context to components.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme color variables, fonts, and custom animations for floating and gentle-float effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AhanaProposalPage.tsx: Renders a themed proposal page with animated particles, a hero section, a love letter, and a list of reasons, styled with the custom color palette.
frontend/src/pages/AhanaValentinePage.ts: Empty page placeholder containing no content.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH‑based theme colors, plugins, container settings, and extended color palettes.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, design notes, and feature tracking for the Ahana Valentine/proposal site.
